      • BomberManController

        public BomberManController(GameBoard myGameBoard)
        Constructs a BomberManController objects given a Gameboar object which represents a given map for the gameplay.
        Parameters:
        myGameBoard - the gameboard or map that contains the static objects as well as the enemies that are going to be displayed during a game session

    • Method Detail

      • checkCollision

        public boolean checkCollision(Character myCharacter,
                              int direction)
        This functions checks if the bomberman next moves are going to cause a collision with other GameObjects.
        Parameters:
        myCharacter - the object character represents a character on the game, like an enemy or the bomberman.
        direction - an integer that represents the direction that the character object is following
        Returns:
        a boolean, tru if the character has a collision for the given direction, false otherwise.

      • move

        public void move(int keyE)
        This method takes care of movement of a character if UP, DOWN, RIGHT OR LEFT key was pressed it used the collision function to detect if a move should take place
        Parameters:
        keyE - an integer that represents the key typed by the user.

      • getmyGameBoard

        public GameBoard getmyGameBoard()
        Returns the myGameBoard field variable of the BomberManController class
        Returns:
        GameBoard the gameboard field variable of the BomberManController

      • checkCollisionRight

        public boolean checkCollisionRight(Character character,
                                   int direction)
        Checks if the Bomberman move to the right is going to cause a collision with a GameObject
        Parameters:
        character - the character object for which the movement is going to be checked for a possible collision given the direction passed as input.
        direction - integer representing a direction that the character is going to follow
        Returns:
        boolean representing true if the movement of the character given the direction is going to cause a collision, false otherwise.

      • checkLeftAndRightUpDownTilesCollision

        public boolean checkLeftAndRightUpDownTilesCollision(Character character,
                                                     int direction)
        Checks if the Bomberman is either between 2 GameObjects placed to its right and left if direction = 1 or direction = 2. Checks if the Bomberman is either between 2 GameObjects placed to its north and south if direction = 3 or direction = 4.
        Parameters:
        character - a Character object for which a collision is going to be verified given the direction passed as input
        direction - an integer representing the direction of the character
        Returns:
        boolean true if the character has a collision given the input direction, false otherwise.

      • checkIfCharacterIsCenteredXAxis

        public boolean checkIfCharacterIsCenteredXAxis(Character character)
        Checks if the character is centered with the X axis = 0;
        Parameters:
        character - the Character object that is going to be checked
        Returns:
        boolean true if the character is centered on the X axis, false otherwise.

        Returns:
        boolean true if the character is centered on the y axis, false otherwise.

      • isCellSharedWithBOMB

        public boolean isCellSharedWithBOMB(Character character)
        Verifies if the current bomberman cell is shared with a bomb.
        Parameters:
        character - that is going to be checked.
        Returns:
        boolean true if the character shares a cell or a tile with a bomb object. False otherwise.

      • moveInsideBomb

        public void moveInsideBomb(int directionMove)
        When the bomberman, a Character object, shares a cell with a bomb, it means that it recently dropped it, so this functions manages the bomberman moves inside a cell where there is also a bomb recently dropped.
        Parameters:
        directionMove - integer representing the direction of the bomberman movement inside a cell that also has a Bomb object.

      • dropBomb

        public void dropBomb()
        * Drops a bomb that is not going to be detonated

      • getDirection

        public int getDirection(int key)
        Converts a direction represented as an integer into either one of these directions 1= Left, 2 = Right, 3 = Up 4 = Down
        Parameters:
        key -
        Returns:
        integer representing one of the fourth directions 1(Left), 2(Right), 3(Up) or 4(Down).

      • pickPowerUp

        public void pickPowerUp(int i,
                        int j)
        Checks for a given cell position (i, j) if the bomnberman is inside the cell represented by the (i, j) position. If the bomberman is in the cell position, the power up in the cell(i,j) is given to the bomberman
        Parameters:
        i - integer representing a row on the 13x31 tiles game board
        j - integer representing a column on the 13x31 tiles game board.
